awd_titl_txt: Fifth Trilateral (USA, China, Japan) Symposium on Catalysis,June 27-29, 1991, in Evanston, IL
awd_abstract_narration: Partial support is provided to the Fifth Trilateral Symposium                   on Catalysis to be held in Evanston, Illinois, on June 27-29,                   1991.  The title of the symposium is "Molecular Interactions                    in Heterogeneous Catalysis".  This funding will provide for                     attendence at the symposium of American researchers who would                   otherwise be unalbe to attend, especially younger                               investigators.                                                                                                                                                  This series of symposia, rotating among the three countries                     (U.S., China, and Japan) has developed into the major trans-                    Pacific forum for catalysis, and is a principal source for                      information on Japanese activity in the field.                                    //
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems
